title: Indian Cabbage Recipe (Oven Roasted)
ingredients: 3 tbsp peanut oil or sesame oil
1 tbsp chopped green chilies (remove seeds to lower heat)
½ tsp red pepper flakes or ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper
Optional: ¼ cup chopped shallots or onions
Optional: 4 tablespoons crushed peanuts or sesame seeds, roasted
instructions: In a large bowl, mix oil, ginger, green chilies, cumin seeds, turmeric, red pepper flakes, and salt.
Add shredded cabbage, carrots, and curry leaves. Toss to coat evenly.
Spread mixture on a parchment-lined baking sheet and roast for 20–25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until tender and slightly caramelized.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with grated coconut, chopped cilantro, and lemon juice. Toss gently.
Garnish with crushed peanuts or sesame seeds if desired. Serve hot with rice.
notes: Use fresh grated coconut for best flavor. If using dried, add it before roasting.
You can prep the mixture ahead and refrigerate it up to a day in advance.
Stovetop variation: stir-fry the mixture in a skillet until tender and golden.
This dish is vegan, gluten-free, low-carb, and suitable for many dietary needs.
